sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import FeatherIcon from 'feather-icons-react' import { formatEtherscanTxUrl } from 'lib/utils/formatEtherscanTxUrl' export function EtherscanTxLink(props) { const { children, className, hash, chainId, noIcon, } = props const url = formatEtherscanTxUrl(hash, chainId) return <> {children} {!noIcon && } }
